short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A stylish paid time off tracker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
According to research from the U.S. Travel Association, 768 million paid time off days went to waste in 2018. That is 768 million opportunities to relax and reduce stress, avoid burnout, and bond with our family and friends. PTO Balance strives to free you from the cumbersome PTO tracking, and make your dream vacation a reality!
